QuestData.Title: Mothallus!
QuestData.Description: The esteemed Journeyman Chu would appear to have created a monster. It is silken death with wings.$b$bMothallus.$b$bYou have already faced its brood. Now we ask that you help us face the creature itself.$b$bPlease, $c, venture into the pit and rifle the bait. This will bring the beast to you.$b$bOur mothfighters will assist you as you need, though silk tends to stick to them more than most so you may need to help them, should they become overwhelmed.
QuestData.RewardText: We are pursuing perfection in our art and in ourselves. Along the way many mistakes will be made.$b$bI'm sure by tomorrow this field will be swimming with more mistakes. Still, we thank you for your help.
